titles.title: Economic Development Revitalization Act of 2008
An original bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to reauthorize that Act, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boxer. With written report No. 110-490. Additional views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1061.
